result.reason: The issue has a clear repro and matches known focus edge cases in our WinForms message-interception path, so it is actionable as a bug fix.
result.approach: Harden WM_ACTIVATEAPP/WM_ACTIVATE handling to prevent unintended refocus during taskbar app switches, then verify with integrated PuTTY and non-PuTTY tabs.
